title: General Estimate for the Graviton Lifetime
abstract: By means of general kinematical arguments, the lifetime $\tau$ of a graviton of energy $E$ for decay into gravitons is found to have the form $\tau^{-1} = \frac{1}{EG} \sum_{j=1,2,...} c_j (\Lambda G)^j$. Some recent, preliminary results of non perturbative simplicial quantum gravity are then employed to estimate the effective values of $G$ and $\Lambda G$. It turns out that a short lifetime of the graviton cannot be excluded.
